DOC.brief_title: Use Sugammadex End Case Routine Anesthesia ( 19.4.311 ) ( P05943 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : ASA Class 13 subject schedule undergo elective surgical procedure general anesthesia require neuromuscular relaxation use rocuronium . Exclusion criterion : Subjects neuromuscular disorder , significant renal dysfunction , malignant hyperthermia , allergy medication use general anesthesia difficult intubation expect . Subjects take medication know interfere neuromuscular block agent . Subject childbearing potential , pregnant , breast feeding
